levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces slightly</> and attacks hit <@ba.vup>2</> times in a row. After hitting a target <@ba.vup>{attack@max_stack_count}</> times, attacks hit <@ba.vup>4</> times in a row for the remainder of the skill duration
